txt.en: Since the Dourhands were driven out of Thorin's Halls, they have harried the hunters of the Blue Mountain Dwarves.

'The hunters who have been plying the forests north of Gondamon have come to me with stories of being threatened or even attacked by those backstabbing Dourhand brigands.

'If you're of a mind to lend us a hand, you could head out there and deal with the treacherous thin-beards! They need to learn not to meddle with the hunters of Gondamon!

'The Dourhands have built a small camp to the north of here, in the hills somewhere. You will find plenty of heads to break there, I'd warrant.'
The Dourhand brigands can be found to the north of Gondamon.\n\nOrlygr has asked you to deal with the Dourhand brigands which have been harrying the hunters of Gondamon.

'Ah good. That should teach the Dourhands a little lesson. You have done us a fair favour, [placeholder], and helped ensure that Gondamon remains secure over the coming winter months. \n\n'Let me see if I can find some suitable reward for you.'
Orlygr is at Gondamon to the south of the Dourhand-encampment.\n\nYou should return to Orlygr and report your success against the Dourhand brigands.
'You should be able to find those brigands in a camp in the hills to the north. They mostly stay holed up in there like rats in their warren.'
'Ha! You showed those Dourhands what we're made of!'
'Well done, [placeholder]! I doubt those Dourhands will trouble our hunters anymore.'
